text: @narendramodi Sir, Dragon surprised the Democratic Nations(DNs) with COVID-19 attack.Dragon will also like DNs to fight with his extended arms.Once DNs are exhausted, Dragon will annihilate them. Now DNs have to surprise the Dragon.
